summary: Ever wanted to travel the roads of Skyrim as a famous Witcher? Well now you can! Go forth as Geralt of Rivia and be sure to vanquish any monsters that come your way!
descriptionHtml:
So, since there is so far no official Witcher 3 Geralt race and I have no clue how to model or even make a race for Skyrim, I thought I would do the next best thing and create a Geralt of Rivia preset for everyone! Yes, I know it sucks, but it's better than nothing in my opinion. Just a warning. I am not responsible for any problems you might have while installing the necessary requirements for the preset. Please make sure your game and any other mods you have are compatible. Also I can't provide any help if something goes wrong, so please keep that in mind. Enjoy the mod and have fun traveling the roads of Skyrim as Geralt of Rivia! :) 



Required Mods for this to work: 

Racemenu: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/? (Latest version.)
Extended Slider Colors: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6923/?
Enhanced Character Edit: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?
ApachiiSkyHair (Specifically Male): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
Geralt Of Rivia Voiced Follower The Witcher (For the Eyes possibly): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71730/?


Eyes Alternative (Choose only one option):

Skyrim Witcher Experience: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9198/?
Skyrim Witcher Experience Enhanced: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34007/?
Eyes of Aber (Will have to find the Witcher eyes yourself.): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?


Recommended Mods: 

Beards: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?
ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture: ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture
Brows: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?
SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and Real Feet Meshes: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?
Witcher 3 Kaer Morhen Armour: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71762/?
The Witcher 2 - Geralt Light Armor and Witcher Swords: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6006/?
Witcher 2 swords HD (Install after the Witcher 2 Geralt light armor and Witcher sword.): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13552/?
author: Jckspacy
